author: Bellular News
description:
Stormgate's future looks grim. Now, Frost Giant Studios CEO Tim Morten comes to terms with his situation, and why Stormgate is struggling to survive.

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!

00:00 - "It was undercooked"
01:16 - Stormgate's Promise
04:51 - The Morten Post Mortem
08:41 - The Industry Changed
13:52 - An Impossible Target

title: Ex-Blizzard Lead: "The Release Was Undercooked"
